rules.isIn: The value for {property} must be one of the allowed values.
rules.isBoolean: The value for {property} must be a boolean.
rules.isDate: The value for {property} must be a valid date.
rules.isString: The value for {property} must be a string.
rules.isNumber: The value for {property} must be a number.
rules.isInt: The value for {property} must be an integer.
rules.isArray: The value for {property} must be an array.
rules.isEnum: The value for {property} must be a valid enum value.
rules.min: The value for {property} must be at least {min}.
rules.max: The value for {property} must not exceed {max}.
rules.isEmail: The value for {property} must be a valid email address.
rules.IsNotEmpty: The value for {property} should not be empty.
rules.maxLength: The value for {property} must not exceed {max} characters.
